actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

actions.committee: House Committee on International Relations (Subsequently: Foreign Affairs)
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations (Subsequently: Foreign Affairs).

official_title: A concurrent resolution indicating the sense of Congress that every person throughout the world has the right to a nutritionally adequate diet; and that this country increase its assistance for self-help development among the world's poorest people until such assistance has reached the target of 1 per centum of our total national production (GNP).

summary.text: Declares that it is the sense of the Congress that every person in the United States and throughout the world has the right to a nutritionally adequate diet, and that the United States should increase its assistance for self-help development among the world's poorest people until such assistance reaches one percent of its total national production (GNP).

titles.title: A concurrent resolution indicating the sense of Congress that every person throughout the world has the right to a nutritionally adequate diet; and that this country increase its assistance for self-help development among the world's poorest people until such assistance has reached the target of 1 per centum of our total national production (GNP).
